title: screens 3.5.8 [Mac Os X] [coque599]
description:
Features

Display Selection
Do you have more than one display attached to your remote Mac?
Screens supports multiple displays allowing you to always access what you need, no matter which display it's on.

One Click Away
Access recent connections and discovered computers through ScreensÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ icon in the system menu bar.

Quick Connect
Screens lets you connect as a guest to a Mac so you can help out friends and relative without the need of their user credentials.
Right-click any of the items in the Discovered Computers list to initiate a one-time connection.
Moreover, Screens Express lets you do that even if you need to connect remotely!

Custom Keyboard Shortcuts
Screens lets you configure system keyboard shortcuts (Ã¢Å’Ëœ-Tab, Spaces, Mission Control, etc.) so they donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t interfere with the rest of your running apps.


Yosemite Ready
Fullscreen mode, Notification Center, Power Management, you name it. Screens for Mac takes advantage of everything OS X 10.10 Yosemite offers.

On Disconnect Actions
Specify an action to trigger right before disconnecting from a computer.
Trigger a Hot Corner, Log Out your User, etc.


Clipboard Support
Send or receive images, rich or plain text, URLs and more with your Mac!
Save the received content or share it via Email, Messages, Twitter, Facebook and more.

Faster Than Ever
Screens now connects a lot quicker and is much snappier. Our new VNC engine is much faster and reliable than its predecessor.

Seed And Enjoy
